headline: Corpay Lodging Launches All-New Mobile App and Added Hotels, Built for Workforce Travel
summary: WICHITA, Kan., July 22, 2025--Corpay Lodging, formerly known as CLC Lodging, just dropped its biggest mobile upgrade yet.

headline: Corpay Cross-Border Named the Official FX Partner of the FIM World Supercross Championship
summary: TORONTO, July 22, 2025--Corpay, Inc.*, (NYSE: CPAY) a global leader in corporate payments, is pleased to announce that Corpay’s Cross-Border business has entered into an agreement with the FIM World Supercross Championship, the premier championship for international stadium supercross racing, to become their Official Foreign Exchange (FX) Partner.

raw.headline: Corpay Cross-Border Named the Official FX Partner of the FIM World Supercross Championship
